attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having been the latest in a very long line of people to end up frustrated, and out of pocket because of this company I feel it's time the PM looked into this company's trading practices.  They are beyond rogue traders (no offence Matt Allwright. Please sign to show your support...

rejection.details: This should be taken up with the Office of Fair Traiding.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
